Name: UNI
About the game: ◎ UNI is a two-player party game containing 40 different types of mini games. UNI includes games from many genres adapted for a two-player game experience: (By update 2019/06/07 5 Games are added and New Mode (Random 5 mode) is added. Sports, Action, Fighting, Arcade, Racing… Even RPG! It’s easy to play and the rules are quite simple, making it enjoyable for all people regardless of age or gender. With UNI, enjoy a happy and wonderful game experience together with your family, friends, and partners. ◎ Feature of UNI 40 mini games of various genres Simple rules for all ages Cute game graphics and fancy screen effects and sound effects You can play with one keyboard or two game controllers New free mini games will be added through update! This game can be played by sharing one keyboard but for full enjoyment it’s better to use 2 joysticks. (recommended controller for Xbox) In Keyboard Play Mode Player 1 can play with Q W E A S D Z X C Keys. Player 2 can play with 7 8 9 4 5 6 1 2 3 Keys. OR I O P K L ; , . / keys in tenkeyless keyboard.
